notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2018YFA0606200, 2018YFA0606202), Guangzhou Science and Technology Project (201704020194), Natural Science Foundation of Guangdong Province (S2013010014670), Guangdong Provincial Development and Reform Commission (201616), the Asia-Pacific Network for Global Change Research (CRRP2016-10MY-Huang), and National Science and Technology Major Program (2012CB955503). These foundations greatly contributed in the process of data collection.
